question: Your local hospital has advertised for people to do unpaid work helping at the hospitsal. You would like to do some work at the hospital in your free time. Write a letter to the hospital. In your letter -explain why you would like to do unpaid work at the hospital-say what type of unpaid work you would be able to do-give details of when you would be available for this work
text: After having seen your advertisement regarding free voluntary work at the local hospital, I would like to assist the hospital in my leisure.

Let me go into more details, I have recently done my master's degree as a psychologist and now I am a part-time employee at the local kindergarten. Helping children, adolescents and adults with their mental issues is my passion. Besides, I want to become more professional in the related spare. That is why I am interested in doing free work at the regional hospital.
I would be glad to work at the hospital, in the same occupation, without any salary, and support your patients to overcome their fears and be more positive, happy while they are being treated.
As I work every day from Monday to Wednesday I will be free after 16.00 pm and I am ready to help till 19.00 pm.
If you require any other information, please do not hesitate to contact me.
